titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in Parliament, by a worthy member thereof, and a most faithfull vvell-wisher to the Church and Common-weale; concerning the grievances of the kingdome. By I.P. Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Pym, John, 1584-1643.

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with "printed for R. Lownes" in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
